com.gotenna.sdk.messages

Class GTTextAndLocationMessageData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gotenna.sdk.messages.GTBaseMessageData
      • com.gotenna.sdk.messages.GTTextOnlyMessageData
        • com.gotenna.sdk.messages.GTTextAndLocationMessageData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GTMessageDataProtocol

    public class GTTextAndLocationMessageData
extends GTTextOnlyMessageData
    Represents a goTenna message that was sent/received. This message contains only text and location data. Created on 3/20/15.
